snippet.title: Besiege: The Splintered Sea (Announcement Trailer)
snippet.description:
Coming to Steam May 24th!

Dive into The Splintered Sea expansion, introducing water to Besiege for more machine-building conquests! Battle your way through a 10-level oceanic campaign, explore an all new sandbox, and harness 8 new blocks to unleash chaos on the high seas!

Wishlist on steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2165710/Besiege_The_Splintered_Sea/

#besiege #steam #dlc #splintered_sea #expansion
